summary: Alexander Sergeyevich Lenkov  was a Russian actor.
full_text: Alexander Sergeyevich Lenkov  was a Russian actor who starred in more than a hundred films. He is probably best known for his voice acting in animated films and dubbing the foreign movies to Russian. He was awarded the People's Artist of Russia title in 1997. He was born Rasskazovo, Tambov Oblast, Russian SFSR, Soviet Union. Lenkov died from a long illness on 21 April 2014 in Moscow, aged 70.
title: Alexander Lenkov
